Author: kimooni
Text: I may be mistaken, but I think frame size is most accurately determined when someone is within a healthy weight, and refer more to bone size/width more than anything. You and I are very close in height and at 210, I also had 7” wrists; since losing weight (currently OW) I’m just barely at 6”.    It’s easy to get caught up, but at the end of the day, you’re stunning and don’t let any silly chart make you feel otherwise ♥️
